item.title: By: Ross
item.dc:creator: Ross
item.description: I don't know if they are real or not, but if they are real, and it is multi-point gesture driven I'll be buying *at least* one of them.
item.content:encoded: I don’t know if they are real or not, but if they are real, and it is multi-point gesture driven I’ll be buying *at least* one of them.
